name: swap (itch) (Day_dreamer)
description:
story:

its boy whose has the ability to shape shift has to rescue his friend Dr.stan ,whose has been kidnapped by the evil mad scientist

this is  fun filled plat former game with the player having many abilities to make the more fun and challenging...
